alert.note: Alert for Brewster (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 02 at 9:57PM CDT until September 04 at 8:18PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Rio Grande at Boquillas affecting Brewster County. .River levels at Boquillas are expected to rise to minor flood levels due to routing of water above Boquillas. For the Rio Grande...including Boquillas...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rio Grande at Boquillas. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet (3.7 meters), the river reaches bankfull, and no damage is expected. Preparations may be necessary to remove water pumps. The park should be notified at this time if additional rises are expected so they will have time to remove the pumps. At 13.0 feet (4.0 meters), the river reaches minor flood stage. Water reaches the water pumps maintained by the park service that are used to water the campgrounds and to provide water to the employee living quarters. It may be necessary for park personnel to remove the pumps. At 15.0 feet (4.6 meters), the river reaches moderate flood stage. Water pumps submerge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 11.2 feet (3.4 meters). - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 13.3 feet (4.1 meters) tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning to 11.9 feet (3.6 meters) tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 12.4 feet (3.8 meters) early Sunday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet (4.0 meters). - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and forecasts (feet): Fld Observed Sat Sat Sat Sat Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1am 7am 1pm 7pm Rio Grande Boquillas 13.0 11.2 Fri 9pm 13.1 13.3 11.9 12.1 Below are the latest river stages and forecasts (meters): Fld Observed Sat Sat Sat Sat Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1am 7am 1pm 7pm Rio Grande Boquillas 4.0 3.4 Fri 9pm 4.0 4.1 3.6 3.7 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
